#summary Compatible software.
#labels Phase-QA

= Introduction =

List of compatible software: compilers and linkers.


= Details =

  * MASM32 package including Microsoft *MASM* compiler and linker. *Closed source*. Restricted license.
  * JWASM compiler. MASM-compatible. *Open source*.
  * FASM compiler and linker (built-in). Supported using add-in. *Open source*.
  * UniLink linker. *Closed source*.
